organizers.name: Gershom Bazerman
organizers.bio: Gershom is a Senior Software Developer at Awake Security. He helped form the New York Haskell Meetup (NYHUG).

organizers.name: Doug Beardsley
organizers.bio: He is a senior software engineer at Kadena. He is one of the original co-organizers of NYHUG.

organizers.name: Kat Chuang
organizers.bio: Once upon a time, not too long ago, Kat studied software design and social support groups. While as a UX Designer working with high-fidelity, rapid prototyping techniquess, she heard about functional programming and was eager to learn more. Currently, Kat is a researcher at Soostone. She created this website and did much to organize the formation of the Compose Conference.

organizers.name: Ryan Trinkle
organizers.bio: Ryan is the CTO at Obsidian Systems. He is one of the original co-organizers of NYHUG.

organizers.name: Anastasia Bez
organizers.bio: Anastasia works at Kadena. She went to Fordham and was instrumental in getting the venue for this year.

organizers.name: Chelsea Betancourt
organizers.bio: Chelsea works at Obsidian Systems. She helped with much of the organization for this conference this year.

organizers.name: Ashish Agarwal
organizers.bio: Ashish is the Founder & CEO of Solvuu. He is also the organizer of the OCaml NYC Meetup and initiated the [ocaml.org](ocaml.org) website.
